title: Did he attend the Republican National Congress and give up the mask and social separation?
subtitle: The masks - or their absence - at the Republican Congress became a political party point during the 2020 presidential election.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Hundreds of people at the 2020 Republican National Congress in Washington, D.C., ignored the recommendations to wear the mask and provide social support, as Trump formally accepted the Republican candidacy.
